name: StormyBoat
0:
”Alexa open Stormy Boat”
”Alexa ask Stormy Boat to play for 8 hours”
”Alexa, pause”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: stormy boat
des:
Set sail on a turbulent sea with Stormy Boat. Feel the adrenaline as your vessel navigates through roaring waves and gusty winds. This skill is perfect for those who seek a thrilling auditory experience or need a dynamic soundscape to fuel their creativity.

1. On Alexa app, navigate to Routines.
2. Click + to add a new routine.
3. Click + for "When this happens" and choose one.
4. Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills".
5. Choose "Your Skills" and select Stormy Boat
6. Choose Device to perform the routine and save.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
